General.Name: Jiangsu Ruitai New Energy Materials Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Jiangsu Ruitai New Energy Materials Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells lithium-ion battery materials and silane coupling agents. It offers power and consumer battery electrolytes, energy storage battery electrolytes, lithium-ion battery electrolyte additives, and supercapacitor products. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Zhangjiagang, China.
General.Address: Textile Raw Materials Market, Zhangjiagang, China, 215600
